ISSUE.TITLE: Unclear default value for --userns
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: The manual page of podman-run says about `--userns`: “Set the user namespace mode for the container. It defaults to the `PODMAN_USERNS` environment variable.” I have no PODMAN_USERNS environment variable. What is the default value for `--userns` (in rootless and rootful mode)? Podamn Version: 4.3.0-dev
